synopsis: A journey through a composite galaxy of artificial light.
tagline: In the age of light pollution, we make our own night sky.

titre: Oru motorin vaakumoolam - ஒரு மோட்டாரின் வாக்குமூலம்
synopsis: A motor narrates the events and a murder that happened in its room with its own innocent perception of the world. The film also explores about the duality/double standards of men.

A Christmas Night is interrupted with a simple visit. Coffee, Milk, Newgate Baked Beans, and Cigarettes are sifted through in a harsh grilling about the sudden appearance and disappearance of a man's son.
